body: I think one way to do this is to create a copy of the new state to be set, except that the keys of the copy would be the `id`s of the original new state, and then pass this to `__setstate__`. Does this sound okay?
body_html: I think one way to do this is to create a copy of the new state to be set, except that the keys of the copy would be the ids of the original new state, and then pass this to __setstate__. Does this sound okay?
body_text: I think one way to do this is to create a copy of the new state to be set, except that the keys of the copy would be the ids of the original new state, and then pass this to __setstate__. Does this sound okay?
